Class Observer

java.lang.Object
Observer
public class Observer
extends java.lang.Object
Scene viewing control.

  • Method Details

    • setProjection

      public void setProjection​(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl, int width, int height)
      Resets the projection matrix according to new viewport and projection angle values.
      Parameters:
      gl - OpenGL2 context.
      width - viewport width.
      height - viewport height.

    • setProjection

      public void setProjection​(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl)
      Resets the projection matrix according to new projection angle.
      Parameters:
      gl - OpenGL2 context.

    • apply

      public void apply​(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl, float[] view)
      Sets the projection and viewing matrices before diplaying a scene.
      Parameters:
      gl - GL2 context
      view - Viewing matrix to be immediately applied (when provided)

    • toggleProjection

      public void toggleProjection()
      Toggles the projection type (perspective / orthographic).

    • zoomIn

      public void zoomIn()
      Narrows the projection field of view.

    • zoomOut

      public void zoomOut()
      Enlarges the projection field of view.

    • move

      public void move​(int control)
      Controls the observer position and orientation.
      Parameters:
      control - motion type: - TURN_RIGHT, TURN_LEFT, NO_RIGHT_LEFT_TURN, - TURN_UP, TURN_DOWN, NO_UP_DOWN_TURN, - MOVE_FRONT, MOVE_BACK, NO_FRONT_BACK_MOVE, - MOVE_RIGHT, MOVE_LEFT, NO_RIGHT_LEFT_MOVE, - MOVE_UP, MOVE_DOWN, NO_UP_DOWN_MOVE

    • resetProjection

      public void resetProjection()
      Resets current projection with default parameters.

    • setCenter

      public void setCenter​(float[] vp)
      Sets the current projection center in the scene.
      Parameters:
      vp - Coordinates of the projection center.

    • setViewingVolume

      public void setViewingVolume​(float[] volume)
      Sets the orthographic projection parameters (default and bounds).
      Parameters:
      volume - Default volume to display (float array containing xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin the zmax)

    • setAccessibleVolume

      public void setAccessibleVolume​(float[] volume)
      Sets the observer bounds.
      Parameters:
      volume - Accessible volume bounds. (float array containing xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin the zmax)

    • setDefaultPosition

      public void setDefaultPosition​(float[] pos)
      Sets the projection center to default position.
      Parameters:
      pos - Default projection center coordinates.
